home.title: Hi! I'm Saugaat
home.description: I'm a software engineer, technical writer, and open source creator. This website is a compendium of the things I have learned over the years, and also my "digital garden". I aim to create a beautiful corner of the web free of ads, sponsored posts, newsletter pop-ups, affiliate links, and the rest of the annoying noise we're so accustomed to seeing on the internet these days. You can read my posts, view my development guides, or contact me at saugaatallabadi@gmail.com
